Adrian Gore bụ onye ọchụnta ego  nke South Africa. Ọ bụ onye guzobere na onye isi otu nke Discovery Limited.

Gore malitere Discovery Limited, onye na-ahụ maka ahụike, na South Africa n'afọ 1992. N'afọ 1992, Gore nwetara mkpụrụ ego maka nchoputa site n'aka Laurie Dippenaar, na ndị ọzọ na-enye ego bụ ndị guzobere Rand Merchant Bank. Nchọpụta agbanweela kemgbe ahụ ghọọ otu ọrụ ego dị iche iche na nke mba dị iche iche.
Tupu Discovery limited, Adrian Gore rụrụ ọrụ na Liberty Life, ụlọ ọrụ mkpuchi na itinye ego.
Ihe omume ntụrụndụ Adriana bụ ịgba ọsọ, ịgba ígwè, ịgụ akwụkwọ.
Gore gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Wits na afọ 1986
Ọ bụ onye otu Actuarial Society of South Africa, onye otu ngalaba nke Actuaries (Edinburgh), onye otu Society of Actuaries (Chicago), na onye otu American Academy of Actuaries.
N'afọ 1998, Ernst & Young ghọtara Gore dị ka onye ọchụnta ego kachasị mma na South Africa, na 2004 a họpụtara ya dị ka onye isi oche nke South Africa na MoneyWeb CEO of the Year Awards kwa afọ
N'afọ 2008, ọ natara onyinye Investec maka nnukwu onyinye na ọrụ ma ọ bụ ọrụ, na 2010, a kpọrọ ya dịka onye isi azụmahịa Sunday Times nke afọ
N'afọ 2013, Gore natara Manex Award site na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand Business School

N'afọ 2015, e tinyere ya na ndepụta Forbes nke "Africa's 50 Richest".  N'afọ 2015, Adrian bụ onye natara McKinsey Geneva Forum of Health Award. Ọzọkwa, o tinyere na "All Africa Businessman of the Year 2016"
N'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2017, Adrian meriri Frost & Sullivan Visionary Innovation Leadership Award for Africa.
Gore bụ onye isi oche nke South Africa nke Endeavor - otu nzukọ na-abaghị uru zuru ụwa ọnụ nke na-achọpụta ma na-enyere ndị ọchụnta ego na-eto eto aka.
